name: Battle of Wizards (The Green Droid)
description:
You are a wizard and you fight against everybody !

You can play :

- alone agains all the others

- in team

You can play :

- alone on your computer

- on internet with your friends or random players

This is a release in early access. A lot lot of things are still missing.

The spells on keyboard are :

- SPACE : classical fire ball

- I : Become invisible

- C : clone yourself

- R : launch a ball of ressurection (target a grave)

- ESC : to quit a game

Have fun and remember : this is a early release. The game is still in dev.

For now, you can't choose your wizard.
